    Description
    Facility
     
    FacilityList
    Manages a list of Facility objects, allowing for the addition and removal of facilities.

    A fragment that handles the uploading of event images and related data to Firestore.
    Lottery
    Lottery class handles the lottery selection process for entrants.
    MapActivity
    This activity is used to view a map containing the locations of different participants that have signed up for a given eventID.
    NewEventForm
    Activity for creating or editing a new event.
    Organizer
     
    OrganizerFacility
    This object creates a Fragment for displaying, editing, adding, or deleting different facilities that belong to an organizer with given deviceID.
    OrganizerHomeActivity
    This activity represents the home screen for the organizer, featuring a bottom navigation bar to navigate between different fragments.
    OrganizerHomeFragment
    This fragment displays a list of events organized by the user (organizer).
    OrganizerProfile
    This fragment displays the organizer's profile, allowing them to view and edit their information.
